sentences.sContent: Bombastic boasts—"We are positioned to become the preeminent provider of XYZ"—do not constitute a position.
sentences.sContent_eng: Bombastic boasts—"We are positioned to become the preeminent provider of XYZ"—do not constitute a position.
sentences.sCn: 言过其实的自夸——“我们定位于成为XYZ的卓越供应商”——并不能构建其地位。

sentences.sContent: And there is every reason to think America will once again regain its preeminent role as an American powerhouse.
sentences.sContent_eng: And there is every reason to think America will once again regain its preeminent role as an American powerhouse.
sentences.sCn: 我们也完全有理由相信，美国将再次赢得美利坚强国的卓越地位。

sentences.sContent: Sweden cars are extremely prestigious and reliable in the world for its preeminent safety performance, including SAAB.
sentences.sContent_eng: Sweden cars are extremely prestigious and reliable in the world for its preeminent safety performance, including SAAB.
sentences.sCn: 瑞典制造的轿车在世界上最为有口皆碑的是其超群的安全性能，萨博也不例外。

remMethod.val: pre(前) + eminent(著名的) → 在著名的人前面 → 卓越的， 杰出的
